com.google.crypto.tink.apps.paymentmethodtoken

Class GooglePaymentsPublicKeysManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.apps.paymentmethodtoken.GooglePaymentsPublicKeysManager

  • public class GooglePaymentsPublicKeysManager
extends Object
    Thread-safe Google Payments public key manager.

    For best performance, use the INSTANCE_PRODUCTION for production environment or INSTANCE_TEST for test environment.

    If you need extra customizations for your use, we recommend you to use GooglePaymentsPublicKeysManager.Builder to construct an instance and keep it as a singleton in a static final variable across requests.

    When initializing your server, we also recommend that you call refreshInBackground() to proactively fetch the keys.

    Since:
    1.0.0
